alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MOBILE AND WEST CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Semmes, or 9 miles northwest of Midtown Mobile, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Semmes, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 158, and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
